data.name: MT Helmet
data.description: MT (Manufacturas Tomas) Helmets are made by the largest motorcycle helmet company in Spain and is one of the most reputed brands in Europe. These helmets are ECE certified which is the highest available safety standard in the world..

data.name: AGV
data.description:
AGV has been a leading force in helmet design and motorcycle racing since its foundation, ceaselessly innovating every area from aerodynamics, comfort and safety to graphics, sponsorship and advertising.
Founded in 1947 by Gino Amisano (1920–2009), AGV rapidly won an unrivalled reputation for its innovative designs and materials, tested on the racetrack and developed with sponsored World Championship riders, including 15-times World Champion Giacomo Agostini and modern MotoGP legend Valentino Rossi.
Acquired by fellow Italian innovator, motorcycle and dynamic sport clothing company Dainese in July 2007, AGV continues to go from strength to strength.
Combining their research and design expertise, AGV and Dainese provide uniquely complete safety and performance solutions that deliver advanced protection from head to toe.

data.name: Alpinestars
data.description: Alpinestars, since its inception in 1963, is now the world-leading manufacturer of professional racing products, motorcycling airbag protection, high-performance apparel and technical footwear. Alpinestars understands that the best design and research is achieved under extreme conditions. Our involvement in Formula 1, NASCAR, AMA and World Motocross and MotoGP has led to the creation of the most advanced technical equipment for the world racing’s top athletes.

data.name: Arai Helmet
data.description: Every Arai helmet is meticulously handmade by craftsmen and women who are active participants in our mission to present the highest level of protection and quality. From the shell to the paint to the liner, the work is performed by hand by experienced, focused specialists.

data.name: MUC-OFF
data.description:
MUC-OFF Nano Tech Bike Cleaner 

Description:

Our fully biodegradable, all-over bike cleaner! Using our state-of-the-art Nano Tech formula, 

Muc-Off cuts through grime quicker than you can say “OMG!” regardless of the weather or riding conditions.

data.name: SHARK
data.description:
Shark Helmets were the first manufacturer to incorporate crumple zones into their helmets

 for further impact dispersion and protection. Shark, using its Formula One Technology, also makes the stiffest and quietest

face shields in the industry at 3mm thick..

data.name: Dainese
data.description:
Dainese is an Italian manufacturer of protective equipment and technical gear for dynamic sports, including motorcycling, mountain biking, winter sports and horseriding.

The company was founded in 1972 by Lino Dainese, now a minority stakeholder in the company,[1][better source needed]

 expanding through organic growth and acquisitions, including Italian helmet manufacturer AGV (2007).[2] Investcorp

 bought a majority of the Dainese Group in 2014.[3] The company has been led by CEO Cristiano Silei since 2015 [

data.name: CABERG
data.description: Caberg has been the first Italian company to introduce a flip up helmet (system helmet) on the market, and the second one worldwide, mainly believing on the great growth potential of the touring market. During the years, the strength point of Caberg has been focusing on smart helmets by combining look with functionality. Care of our premises, located in a modern building, are concentrated the management, the production department and a test laboratory, which guarantees successful conformity tests required by the law, so that the products will offer the highest safety and top comfort to the motorcyclist.

data.name: Helmet
data.description: A motorcycle helmet is a type of helmet used by motorcycle riders. The primary goal of a motorcycle helmet is motorcycle safety – to protect the rider's head during impact, thus preventing or reducing head injury and saving the rider's life..

data.name: Jacket
data.description: Jackets meant for motorcyclists are typically made of leather or specialized man-made fabrics like cordura or Kevlar. These jackets typically include heavy padding on the elbow, spine, and shoulder regions.

data.name: Gloves
data.description: Motorcycle riding gloves are designed to keep your hands safe and warm while riding. They are built with toughness and comfort in mind. They'll protect your hands from injury if you ever need to use them to catch the bike or right yourself during a fall. Help circulate air. Many are built to keep your hands dry.

data.name: Rapide Duel H4 Gloss
data.description: Rapide Pro. Full face helmet in sporty style, made of light and compact fiber, equipped with a large clear visor and practical micrometric closure, ideal on the track, perfect also every day, on the road or in the street circuit.
data.features:
Data sheet:
- racing style
- fiber shell
- The helmet is produced with caps of different sizes depending on the size proposed and thus allows to offer a perfect proportion between the volume of the helmet and the size of the rider, while maintaining the degree of protection and safety.
- with clear visor MT-V14 anti-scratch quick release model
- predisposition for Pinlock lens
- removable and washable interior
- micrometric closure
- weight 1300gr

data.name: CABERG Levo
data.description: LEVO IS THE FLIP-UP BY CABERG, WITH INNOVATIVE DESIGN AND AVANT-GARDE TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS DEVELOPED FOR THE MOST DEMANDING TOURING RIDERS.
data.features:
The shell is made of fiberglass; the shell of the LEVO CARBON version, instead, is entirely made of carbon. 

The two shell sizes offer the best fitting proportion between the shell volume and the motorcyclist’s head size. 

LEVO obtained the P/J dual homologation after passing the requirements set by the ECE test regulations both for full face (P) and Jet (J) helmets that allows to ride also with the chin guard open. 

The ventilation system offers optimal comfort even during the most extreme conditions thanks to two air front vents, two rear air extractors, and the built-in channels present in the inner shell. 

LEVO is equipped with a panoramic ultra-wide visor that allows the best fields of vision, ensuring an amplified visibility in the front part equal to 82°. The helmet is also equipped with Pinlock Max Vision lens to avoid misting and an integrated sunshade visor (DVT Double Visor Tech) easy to manoeuvre with gloves. 

The lining, made with the best hypoallergenic and transpiring fabrics to grant maximum freshness, is entirely removable and washable. 

Moreover, the cheek pads have been conceived to permit the accommodation of glasses. 

Thanks to the space for the microphone and speakers, LEVO is ready to be equipped with the main communication systems on the market. LEVO can be equipped with the Caberg communicator JUST SPEAK EVO. 

LEVO is offered in the solid colors: matt black, white metal, and the new matt blue yama; HI VIZION yellow fluo. LEVO is also available in the graphic versions FLOW and PROSPECT. LEVO is also available with shell in Carbon and chin guard matt black, LEVO CARBON. 

LEVO is made in Italy.

 

Features:
  • Shell: Fiberglass
  • Shell: carbon (model Levo Carbon)
  • Double shell size
  • Double visor (clear + smoke)
  • Quick release visor system
  • Double anti-turbulence neck roll
  • Anti-scratch visor with Pinlock Max Vision
  • Micrometric buckle
  • Internal air-circulation
  • Removable and washable liner
  • Rain protection rims
  • Wind tunnel aerodynamic testing
  • Removable wind-stop
  • Wide visor Max Vision
  • Ready for Just Speak EVO or other communication systems in after market

 

 

Sizes:

Small shell
XS 53/54
S 55/56
M 57/58
Large shell
L 59/60
XL 61/62

data.name: CABERG Tourmax
data.description: TOURMAX IS THE FIRST FLIP UP ADVENTURE ON THE MARKET CONCEIVED FOR ALL THE ENDURO AND MAXI ENDURO MOTORCYCLES OWNERS.
data.features:
As result of the long experience gained by Caberg, the first Italian company to produce flip-up helmets, the TOURMAX 100% Made in Italy is equipped with a peak that automatically moves close to the visor when opening the chin guard in order to minimize air resistance. 

TOURMAX comes with the dual homologation P/J which allows you to ride with the chin guard open guaranteeing safety thanks to the lever P/J on the left-hand side of the helmet. This lever when in the “J” position, blocks the chin guard in the fully open position avoiding the chin guard to accidentally close. Inside the product Box are present the screws to transform the TOURMAX in a traditional flip-up model without peak. 

TOURMAX is equipped with the exclusive Double Visor Tech system that, thanks to the easy to use inner sunvisor, allows you to ride always with the right light and in safety. The inner sun visor is treated anti-scratch, while the outer clear visor is not only anti-scratch but also anti-fog thanks to the double lens Pinlock. Ventilation is guaranteed by two wide vents placed on the chin guard and on the shell that are easy to maneuver also with gloves. The air is channelled through grooves on the inner liner that ensure perfect ventilation of the helmet. The lining is completely removable and washable, realized with breathable and hypoallergenic fabric for maximum freshness, with reflective inserts at the back of the neck. 

TOURMAX is offered in the solid colors: matt black, matt gun metal, and white metal; and in the sport graphic versions MARATHON and TITAN respectively offered in two colors combinations. 

TOURMAX has a seating to accommodate the Caberg Bluetooth communication system “JUST SPEAK EVO” which allows to communicate not only with your own mobile phone and your passenger but also to connect to a GPS system, listen to music through your mobile or an MP3 player. JUST SPEAK EVO is equipped with Bluetooth A2DP that permits to listen in high quality stereo.

 

 

Technical details Tourmax

Features
  • Shell: LG CHEM HI-IMPACT ABS
  • Double visor (clear + smoke)
  • Quick release visor system
  • Anti-scratch visor with Pinlock
  • Micrometric buckle
  • Internal air-circulation
  • Removable and washable liner
  • Rain protection rims
  • Removable wind-stop
  • Ready for Just Speak EVO or other communication systems in after market
Sizes
XS 53/54
S 55/56
M 57/58
L 59/60
XL 61/62

data.name: VR46 VICTORY LEATHER JACKET
data.description:
With a design based on first-hand experience on the MotoGP™ circuits in collaboration with some of the world's greatest champions, the VR46 VICTORY integrates Dainese's most sophisticated technology into a super-sporty jacket, inspired by the iconic style of Valentino Rossi.
An aesthetic union, fusing the red of the Speed Demon with the Doctor's signature yellow for the very first time. Its exclusive D-SKIN® 2.0 leather construction with special silicone and resin treatment is soft, comfortable and highly protective in all riding situations. Bi-Axial stretch technology, strategically positioned where it's needed the most on the jacket, ensures complete freedom of movement, allowing the rider to execute the smallest of manoeuvres while on the saddle for maximum confidence.
The larger aluminum shoulder plates - a Dainese hallmark - help the rider to slide in the event of a fall and reduce the risk of dangerous rotations, unlike those made from plastic materials, which have a greater grip on the asphalt. The RSS 2.0 elbow system, level 2 protectors and aerodynamic race hump allow riders to tackle every bend with the confidence and safety they need to continuously push themselves beyond their limits. Just like the Doctor has been doing for more than 20 years, writing the history of the MotoGP™.
data.features:

data.name: NEMBO GORE-TEX GLOVES+GORE GRIP TECHNOLOGY
data.description: Unparalleled comfort and protection for motorbike adventures in the most adverse conditions. The Nembo gloves are the top of the Dainese range for touring. The innovative GORE-TEX® Grip technology, which allows complete welding of each layer of the glove to prevent micro-movements of the fabric, provides complete weather protection and a secure grip on the handlebars whenever you ride. The Ergo-Techno knuckles, reinforcements, leather, and TPU combine the highest Dainese protection standards with exceptional comfort so that you can safely live up to your full potential on endless travels filled with motorbike passion.

data.name: PISTA GP RR ECE DOT LIMITED EDITION - SPECIALE
data.description: Pista GP RR is an exact replica of the AGV helmet used in races by professional world championship riders. It has therefore received FIM homologation, which certifies the highest possible level of protection, even against any dangerous twisting of the head. Every detail is designed to ensure ultimate performance. The Extreme Carbon shell in 100% carbon fiber guarantees extraordinary lightness, which make it effortless to wear. Its shapes and metal air vents are studied in the wind tunnel and tested by AGV athletes in order to ensure the best aerodynamic penetration and the greatest stability at high speeds, also as a result of the innovative profile of the rear PRO Spoiler. Boasting up to 5mm thickness, the optical class 1 Ultravision visor is an integral part of protection that enables 190° panoramic vision. This means the rider sees the track, adversaries, and obstacles more clearly, before anyone else. The exclusive 360° Adaptive Fit system allows for complete customization of the interior, giving the rider the possibility to select the ideal thickness for the upper part of the head, nape, and cheeks. Essential comfort that allows the rider to concentrate on the goal without distractions.

data.name: AGV Sport Mojave Jacket
data.description:
AGV Sport Mojave Jacket

The Mojave Jacket from AGV Sport is adventure-ready. With an emphasis on airflow, the Mojave Jacket features large mesh panels at the chest and back designed with the hard-working ADV rider in mind. Magnetic fasteners at the chest vents and a collar-stay for even more airflow maximize cooling. Water-resistant zippers at the same vents and a waterproof thermal liner team-up to keep unwanted nature out. Smoothways impact armor at the elbows and shoulders and a back protector all are included.  A circumferential zipper allows the jacket to mate to the Mojave Pants - creating a full ADV riding suit that meets CE garment certifications.
data.features:
Features: 

  • Abrasion resistant polyester main construction 
  • Reinforced impact areas at elbows and shoulders
  • Water resistant 75g removable thermal liner
  • Reflective trim and piping for nighttime visibility
  • Adjustable waist 
  • Oversized airflow panels at chest and back
  • Rear stash pocket
  • Zippered inner arm vents with adjustable hook and loop wrist closure
  • Advanced Safety Stitching Construction (ASSC) with mil-spec thread and triple stitching at impact zones
  • 360-degree pant to jacket attachment zipper
  • Smoothways CE Level 2 shoulder, elbow and back protector
  • Meets CE certification for protective riding garments

data.name: AGV Sport Palomar Jacket
data.description:
AGV Sport Palomar Jacket

Sharing its name with the mountainous Palomar Loop in San Diego County, the Palomar Jacket from AGV Sport exhilarates the soul like your favorite series of apexes. Distressed cowhide construction is rugged with a livery of leather stripes as a shout to racers of yore. Contrasting panels at the chest, shoulders, inner arms and back are perforated for hot-weather ventilation. Add the removable 75 gram thermal liner, and the Palomar will serve you just as handily on those cool midnight runs. Burnished fasteners, pleated elbows and stitched AGV Sport branding complete the look. Smoothways CE Level 2 armor - included for the elbows, shoulders and back - are a nod to the today's racer and contemporary safety engineering.
data.features:
Features: 

  • Vintage cowhide construction
  • Perforated panels at the chest, shoulders, inner arms and back
  • Removable 75g thermal liner
  • Embroidered AGV Sport branding
  • Drop seat with hook and loop waist adjusters
  • Inside pocket
  • Jacket to pants connection loop
  • Advanced Safety Stitching Construction (ASSC) with mil-spec thread and triple stitching at impact zones
  • Smoothways CE Level 2 elbow, shoulder and back protection

data.name: STELLA ANDES V3 DRYSTAR JACKET
data.description: The Andes v3 Jacket is anatomically engineered for an optimized women’s fit and its exclusive Alpinestars Drystar® construction ensures 100% waterproofing and high levels of breathability, even in difficult riding conditions. The technically advanced construction of this jacket offers protection and abrasion resistance and is adaptable to all weather conditions.
data.features:
• Front waterproof cargo pockets for convenience and peace-of-mind closure.


• Large, external utility pocket on lower back, plus internal pockets and a waterproof wallet pocket for real-world practicality.


• Integrated soft edge collar and 3D mesh construction for enhanced comfort over long distances.


• Premium YKK zipper for main front closure offers adaptable, secure and convenient closure.


• Adjustable bottom side gussets for an optimal fit.


• Removable long-sleeve thermal liner (100g body 80g sleeves) ensures comfort on hot or cold days.


• Pre-contoured sleeves with stretch panels on elbows for comfort and freedom of movement


• Hook and loop-closing waist adjustment belt ensures a highly customizable fit

data.name: Arai Ram-X Helmet (LG)
data.description:
Arai Ram-X Helmet

With the Ram-X, Arai takes a leap forward from their previous premium open-face touring helmet, the XC. The Ram-X features the newly designed VAS-Z shield system with a lower pivot point providing smooth actuation and improved safety. In a nod to touring riders, the Ram-X includes a Pro Shade System out of the box which provides the convenience of a drop down sun visor without compromising the shell and thus safety of the helmet. Taking design clues and the ventilation scheme from Arai's race helmet, the Corsair X, the Ram-X offer best-in-class ventilation for a comfortable ride no matter what.
data.features:
Features:

  • Super Fiber Laminate shell with new Z-compound
  • Corsair X ventilation scheme
  • Multiple-foam interiors for comfort
  • Removable/replaceable cheek pads for custom fit
  • Side cowl exhausts
  • VAS-Z Pro Shade shield, holder and base plates
  • Advance flip up face shield precurved and super scratch-resistant
  • Meets or exceeds Snell 2015 and DOT standards

data.name: Alpinestars Supertech M10 Carbon Helmet
data.description:
Alpinestars Supertech S-M10 Carbon Helmet

Rome wasn't built in a day. Don't expect a sprawling city that can be considered the first ever metropolis or the capital of the world to be made lickety split.  Similarly, Alpinestars' first foray into off-road motorcycle helmets took years of development, but the pay-off is a high end carbon fiber helmet with state of the art features and materials.

The Alpinestars Supertech S-M10 Carbon helmet uses a lightweight carbon fiber shell that comes in 4 different shell sizes. Its visor release system holds the visor/peak securely, but releases in the event of impact. Alpinestars provides 2 peaks with 2 different angles depending on the rider's preference. Ventilation is top notch with numerous inlet and outlet ports connected with a series of airways that snake through the interior. The internal liner is an amalgamation of protective and comfort materials. A multiple density inner liner absorbs impacts while a MIPS-E2 liner protects against rotational energy. Alpinestars' proprietary A-Head system is an adjustable head frame that allows you to adjust how the helmet sits on the head. Soft EPP foam cushions the bottom lip of the helmet to help avoid collarbone injury in the event of a crash. Emergency removable cheek pads along with a design prepared for the E-Ject helmet removal system make the Alpinestars Supertech S-M10 Carbon Helmet a protective motocross helmet filled to the brim with safety features. 

This isn't a fast food burger that has been sitting under a heat lamp. This type of refinement has to be made from the ground up. The feature packed Alpinestars Supertech S-M10 Carbon Helmet is a Michelin starred restaurant's testing menu compared to lower end helmets.
data.features:
Features:

  • Lightweight outer shell constructed from carbon fiber
  • Four shell sizes
  • Multiple density inner liner
  • Fitted with E-2 MIPS
  • Easy release peak
  • 2 peaks included, one regular and one super high
  • A-Head adjustable top pad height
  • Maximum ventilation with 19 intake and 5 exhaust ports
  • Side shell shape coupled with soft EPP foam to prevent damage to collarbone in case of crash
  • Removable, emergency release cheek pads with 3D contoured foam
  • Removable anti-bacterial and hydrophobic comfort liner
  • Hydration prepared
  • E-Ject prepared
  • DOT and ECE approved

data.name: MT Blade 2SV Trick Blue Helmet
data.description: This one’s an outcome of sheer transformation. An all-purpose helmet that is not just out of the ordinary, but is destined to change from good to great. The Trick makes you feel like a superhero on the inside. After all, confidence is in the head.
data.features:
Shell:

  • High Impact Injected polycarbonate shell for improved protection.
  • Multiple Shell Sizes - to provide the right fit for maximum safety.
  • Multi-density inner EPS, designed for better impact absorption.
  • Unique Aerodynamic Shell, with an integrated split-wing spoiler ( First in the Industry)  
  • Multi-ventilation system with optimized airflow to help the rider feel comfy during extreme heat.

Visor:

  • Pin-lock ready Max Vision Visor - equipped to attach/detach Anti-fog inserts. For a clear edge-to-edge vision even in foggy weather conditions.
  • Adjustable Internal Sun Visor for cozy long-distance riding in the blistering sun.
  • Turbulators along the sides of the visor to reduce buffeting.
  • Push-to-release locking mechanism for easy opening and closing of the visor.
  • MT’s Quick Release System (QRS) helps in removing and replacing the visor effortlessly. 

Interior:

  • Luxury Dual-tone anti-allergic and wicking internal fabrics - absorbs and dissipates perspiration from the skin.
  • Laser-cut foam padding for an ultimate contoured fit.
  • Easily removable and washable interiors to keep helmet clean.
  • Removable chin curtain.
  • Embedded speaker pockets for Bluetooth communication systems.

Safety:

  • Dual Certification - ECE R-22.05 (EU) & DOT (US).
  • EU Ratchet fasteners for easy fastening and unfastening even while gloved.

Other:

  • At a weight of 1550 (+/-50) grams, it is light on the head.

 The color of the image may vary slightly from the actual product.

*High – viz colors are prone to faster UV degradation because of their nature

data.name: Caberg Drift Evo Gama Matt Helmet (Red Blue)
data.description: A stylish yet comfortable helmet that is track appropriate and functional for everyday use.
data.features:
Shell:

  • High-tech tri-composite construction. Makes the helmet extremely strong yet lightweight.
  • Multiple Shell Sizes to provide maximum safety with an innovative inner lining, offer the perfect balance between comfort and fitting.
  • Multi-density inner EPS designed for better impact absorption.
  • Unique aerodynamic shell. Wind tunnel tested.
  • The rear spoiler gives a sporty and aggressive look to the helmet, enhances the aerodynamics at higher speed and reduces the turbulence.
  • Multi- ventilation system with two easy to use vents that lets air channel through grooves on the inner liner that ensures perfect ventilation for uninterrupted comfort on the go

 

Safety:

  • Certification - ECE R-22.05 (EU) .
  • Robust Chin Strap with Double D-Ring fasteners - Safest way to fasten a helmet.

 

Visor:

  • Anti scratch treated , outer clear visor along with exclusive Max Vision Pinlock lens to avoid fogging
  • Pinlock 30 Vision Visor - equipped to attach/detach anti-fog inserts, for a clear edge-to-edge vision even in foggy weather conditions.
  • Integrated DVT (Double Visor Tech) anti-scratch (Smoke) sunshade visor easily maneuverable with a lateral lever for cozy long-distance riding in the blistering sun.
  • The double movement spring visor mechanism to avoid incoming of water or air.
  • Pinlock ready Max Vision visor, equipped to attach/detach Anti-fog inserts for a clear edge-to-edge vision even in foggy weather conditions.
  • Lever on the left side of the visor mechanism consents to stop the position of the visor at 0,5cm from the window beading to avoid or eliminate fogging, which is absorbed by the wind while riding even at higher speed. When the lever is lifted, the visor is locked to avoid sudden opening during a ride or fall.
  • Quick Release System (QRS) helps in removing and replacing the visor effortlessly.
  • Comes with a pinlock 70  set in the box 

 

Interior:

  • Breathable and hypoallergenic internal fabric for maximum freshness - absorbs and dissipates perspiration from the skin.
  • Easily removable and washable interior paddings to keep helmet clean.
  • Reflective inserts at the neck roll
  • Removable chin curtain.
  • Embedded speaker pockets for Bluetooth communication systems.

 

Weight:

  • At a weight of 1390 +/- 50 gr) grams for Composite Fiber (1280 +/- 50 gr) grams for Carbon , reduced dimensions of the helmet makes sturdy while maintaining functionality

 

Warranty:

  • 2 years Premium warranty.

 

Others:

At a weight of (1390 +/- 50 gr) grams for Composite Fiber (1280 +/- 50 gr) grams for Carbon, reduced dimensions of the helmet makes sturdy while maintaining functionality

 

* The color of the actual product may vary slightly from the image shown.

data.name: MT Off Road Motorcycle Helmet
data.description: This Falcon blends the comfort and riding characteristics of a off road helmet with race-bred aerodynamics and performance. Equipped with plush interiors and an extended peak, the Falcon will let you explore the extreme journey .
data.features:
Shell:

  • HIRP (High Impact Resistance Polymer) structure construction. Makes the helmet extremely strong yet lightweight.
  • Multiple Shell Sizes to provide maximum safety with an innovative inner lining, offer the perfect balance between comfort and fitting.
  • Multi-density inner EPS designed for better impact absorption.
  • Unique aerodynamic shell. Wind tunnel tested.
  • Multi- ventilation system which lets air channels through grooves on the inner liner that ensures perfect ventilation for uninterrupted comfort on the go
  • Unique Aerodynamic Shell, with integrated adjustable extended additional peak.   

Interior:

  • Breathable and hypoallergenic internal fabric for maximum freshness - absorbs and dissipates perspiration from the skin.
  • Easily removable and washable interior paddings to keep helmet clean.
  • Reflective inserts at the neck roll.

Safety:

  • Dual Certification - ECE R-22.05 (EU) & DOT (US).
  • Robust Chin Strap with Double D-Ring fasteners - Safest way to fasten a helmet

Other:

  • At a weight of 1400 (+/-50) grams, it is light on the head.

 

 The color of the image may vary slightly from the actual product.

*High – viz colors are prone to faster UV degradation because of their nature

data.name: Full Face
data.description:
A Flip Up helmet is an open helmet and Full Face helmet in one. With a Flip Up helmet you are able to flip it open by simply using the chin guard which is attatched to a hinge construction. The handy thing is that you can transform your Full Face helmet into an Open Face helmet with just one simple hand movement. Flip Up helmets are widely used by touring riders who regulary switch between speed and therefore would like to open their helmet. A Flip Up helmet is also ideal for the installation of a Bluetooth headset. 

Note that not every Flip Up helmet has a so called double homologation or P/J approval. This double homologation means that a helmet is approved for use as a Open Face helmet as a Full Face helmet. If a helmet doesn't have such approval you can not drive with an unfolded chin guard. 

For most Flip Up helmets you just flip up the chin guard. Disadvantage is that you have a big wind deflector on top of your helmet, which is annoying at higher speeds. A number of Flip Up helmets have a chin guard which completely folds back. An example is the Shark Evoline 3. A modular helmet is also kind of a Flip Up helmet. Of this you can just click the chin guard off the helmet en put in your pocket or purse.

data.name: Open Face
data.description:
Full Face helmets are closed helmets that provide extra protection to the head by means of a solid chin section.  Because the shell is made from one single area this type of helmet offers the best protection from falls or collisions. Full Face helmets are available in a lot of different price ranges varying from a few tens to thausands of euros. The difference lies in de material of the outer shell, finish, comfort and safety. Many Full Face helmets have a built-in sun visor, removable inner lining and extensive ventilation.  

In the more expensive segment are Full Face helmets often wind tunnel tested. Sporting helmets are often provided with aerodynamic slots and various spoilers in order to keep the head stable at higher speeds. For each type of motor the placement of the spoilers is also different. On a naked bike you have after all a different posture than on a racing bike. Touring helmets are primarily focussed to cause as little noise as possible, therefore they are usually provided with almost none protrusions. A Full Face helmet is perfect for the installation of a Bluetooth communication system.

data.name: Cross Helmets
data.description:
Cross helmets are primarely used in motocross. Two outstanding features of a Cross helmet are the protruding chin guard and the so-called peak. A normal Full Face helmet gives too little oxygen during the efforts of motocross. In the past therefore they raced with Open Face helmets. These helmets offered not enough protection against splashing clods and stones. Later they invented a loose chin guard, today this is part of the helmet and provides the right protection but also sufficient oxygen. The valve or peak is designed to protect the face from dirt clods and stones. A Cross helmet is not equipped with a visor but there is an opening large enough to wear cross glasses. A typical Cross helmet is not intended for evereyday use but if it has an ECE approval you are allowed to carry it on public roads. 

Between a Cross helmet and a Full Face helmet there is a so called Enduro helmet. This helmet has the appearance of a Cross helmet but is fitted with a visor (sometimes a sun visor) and is more comfortable than a pure cross helmet. Enduro helmets are commonly worn by (semi offroad) motorbikes like the BMW GS (Adventure) or Yamaha XTZ.

data.name: Cruiser
data.description: The classic styles of motorcycle jackets that have become synonymous with motorcycling all fall under the category of cruiser jackets. Leather is far and away the most common material used to construct cruiser jackets. That being said, synthetic textiles and cotton are growing in popularity. Fashion and comfort are the two largest driving factors behind cruiser jackets. The fit is generally on the looser side to provide more room for comfort. Armor is usually little to none, though more and more offerings are starting to come with the jacket as the armor technology improves and becomes less intrusive generally riding at a much lower speed than you would with a sport bike.

data.name: Racing
data.description: Motorcycle racing jackets need to be constructed with high abrasion resistant materials due to the risk of high speed offs. A thick cowhide is often the best and most common material used for the jacket's main chassis due to its excellent abrasion resistance. Synthetic stretch panels are placed in key areas to aid in rider mobility. Internal armor and external TPU sliders are common to provide protection against high speed impacts and slides. Pockets are minimal to none. Motorcycle racing jackets have a very tight fit to be more aerodynamic. The sleeves are pre-curved to fit the tucked riding position, which helps to reduce rider fatigue. A zipper is often included on the bottom hem of the jacket to attach it to a pair of racing pants. This will prevent the jacket from sliding up during a slide.

data.name: Sport/Street
data.description: Sport jackets are often seen as a more casual or relaxed version of a racing jacket with a few more features. The cut is very similar to meet the needs of the sport bike riding position, but the fit is a bit more loose and relaxed. Unlike racing jackets, street jackets are commonly made with textiles. There are quite a few leather options as well and there are also combinations of both. For more seasonal versatility, venting and removable liners are often included in sport bike jackets. Pockets are still minimal, but there are usually more on a sport jacket compared to a race jacket. Armor is very common in most sport bike jackets.

data.name: Adventure/Dual Sport
data.description: As the niche of adventure touring/dual sporting continues to grow, so does the gear that is specifically tailored for it. ADV jackets need to accommodate the variety of different riding situations that you may come across on an ADV ride. They are almost always made with highly durable textiles that are waterproof/breathable. Armor is almost always included or is at least an option. You will find plenty of venting and often an insulated liner so that you are prepared for all temperatures. ADV jackets generally have a plethora of pockets to be able to haul more gadgets and necessities for longer trips. The cut of the jacket comes below the waist for the best coverage for riding in an upright position or standing, both of which are common positions on ADV bikes. The collar is often tall for complete neck coverage.

data.name: Flip Up Helmet
data.description:
A Flip Up helmet is an open helmet and Full Face helmet in one. With a Flip Up helmet you are able to flip it open by simply using the chin guard which is attatched to a hinge construction. The handy thing is that you can transform your Full Face helmet into an Open Face helmet with just one simple hand movement. Flip Up helmets are widely used by touring riders who regulary switch between speed and therefore would like to open their helmet. A Flip Up helmet is also ideal for the installation of a Bluetooth headset. 

Note that not every Flip Up helmet has a so called double homologation or P/J approval. This double homologation means that a helmet is approved for use as a Open Face helmet as a Full Face helmet. If a helmet doesn't have such approval you can not drive with an unfolded chin guard. 

For most Flip Up helmets you just flip up the chin guard. Disadvantage is that you have a big wind deflector on top of your helmet, which is annoying at higher speeds. A number of Flip Up helmets have a chin guard which completely folds back. An example is the Shark Evoline 3. A modular helmet is also kind of a Flip Up helmet. Of this you can just click the chin guard off the helmet en put in your pocket or purse.

data.name: Race Gloves
data.description: Manufacturers put a lot of effort into race gloves, because of the demands put on these gloves along with the exposure they get. Race gloves are always full gauntlets, and have serious armor and protection for high-speed crashes. They usually have thin palms for good throttle control, and lots of ventilation.

data.name: Fingerless
data.description: Used more for a tough guy image than for actual protection, these may offer some hand and knuckle protection, but leave your precious fingers unprotected. We don’t recommend that you ride in them, but if that’s your style, we’ll sell them to you
